steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_team_project --> navigate to Page_project
step 4: At Page_project click on hyperlink_configurations --> navigate to Page_test-project
step 5: At Page_test-project click on hyperlink_connect_git_script_repository --> navigate to Page_git-test-project_setup
step 6: At Page_git-test-project_setup click on div_object
step 7: At Page_git-test-project_setup click on button_object --> navigate to Page_test-project
step 8: At Page_test-project click on hyperlink_edit --> navigate to Page_test-git_edit
step 9: At Page_test-git_edit click on hyperlink_test_environments --> navigate to Page_agent
step 10: At Page_agent click on hyperlink_agent_setup --> navigate to Page_test-environment-installation
step 11: At Page_test-environment-installation click on hyperlink_integrations --> navigate to Page_integrations
step 12: At Page_integrations click on hyperlink_tests --> navigate to Page_test-design_test-cases
step 13: At Page_test-design_test-cases click on hyperlink_test_suites --> navigate to Page_test-design_test-suites
step 14: At Page_test-design_test-suites click on hyperlink_menu_reports --> navigate to Page_overview
step 15: Add visual checkpoint at Page_overview
